1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Jabir bin Abdullah said:"The Prophet prohibited us from facing the Qiblah while urinating. Then i saw him facing it a year before he died

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ مِنَ الرُّخْصَةِ فِي ذَلِكَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Permission for That
